metadata.name: Simplicity is Bliss
metadata.description:
The smoky haze of recent chaos has settled within the Rocky peaks. Fires have been blazing across Western Canada for months. A pandemic has restricted movement and wonder for over a year. Yet here, in this moment, as the distant splash of canoe paddles quietly echoes across the glistening water, everything is perfect. Blissful and bright.

Soundtrack: "Simplicity is Bliss" by Rufus du Sol

Artist: Alex Mackenzie
Location: Banff National Park, AB, Canada
